resources.string:
"Arrange the pieces to recreate the original image

Contols:
 - Tap a piece to rotate it clockwise by 90 degrees
 - Long press and move a piece to drag it. Dragging a piece on another piece will swap the 2 pieces

Pieces that are incorrectly placed are indicated by a yellow border

Tap on 'See Original Image' to view the full image again

That's it! Good luck!

(To close, tap anywhere oustide this dialog)"

"The app encountered an error and will not work as expected.

Please report this along with the error code in the next line.
Error code: %d

(To close, tap anywhere oustide this dialog)"
